Files Headings

baseIsEqual.js

 
var baseIsEqualDeep = require('./baseIsEqualDeep'),
    isObject = require('../lang/isObject'),
    isObjectLike = require('./isObjectLike');

The base implementation of _.isEqual without support for this binding customizer functions.

Params
value The value to compare.
other The other value to compare.
[customizer] Function The function to customize comparing values.
[isLoose] boolean Specify performing partial comparisons.
[stackA] Array Tracks traversed value objects.
[stackB] Array Tracks traversed other objects. 
function baseIsEqual(value, other, customizer, isLoose, stackA, stackB) {
  if (value === other) {
    return true;
  }
  if (value == null || other == null || (!isObject(value) && !isObjectLike(other))) {
    return value !== value && other !== other;
  }
  return baseIsEqualDeep(value, other, baseIsEqual, customizer, isLoose, stackA, stackB);
}

module.exports = baseIsEqual;
